籤詩版本二:
ULuan Feng Xiang wayethelwe ngamanzi, kodwa ngelo xesha wayexhatshazwa nguQueer.
Ndothuka ndakuva ukuba ngenye imini amafu ayekude, kodwa iimpahla zam ndazibuyisela kuwe.
詩意:
Le hexagram imele isimboli saseLuan kunye nePhoenix ezigqunywe yimvula.
Yonke into iza xa kufika ixesha.
解曰: Umntu okhohlakeleyo uyaphumelela umhla nezolo. Umntu onesidima akufunekanga enze nto. Zigcine nje kuwe. Thatha inyathelo xa ixesha lifikile.
籤詩故事一:
◇UGao Jun uqinisekisa umtshato
Ekuqaleni kweNgoma yeNgoma, uZhao Kuangyin wamanyanisa umntla kwaye ilizwe lonke lanikezela. Nangona kunjalo, kwi-Southern Tang Dynasty, uLi Yu wazinza emazantsi oMlambo iYangtze. ukubambisa uZhao Kuangyin eShouzhou, kwaye imeko yayinzima. Umtshana kaZhao Kuangyin, uGao Junbao, umfana owayephethe umpu wegolide, wayishiya iBianjing ukuze aphule ungqingo lwaseShouzhou.
, bedlula kwiNtaba yeShuangsuo, balukroboza umqondiso woMyeni owamiselwa nguLiu Jinding, baza aba babini bakhuphisana.” Ngenxa yoko, uLiu Jinding wamoyisa izihlandlo ezithathu uGao Junbao ngobugcisa bakhe bokulwa obugqwesileyo, baza bananiselana ubomi babo bonke ngeemayisi zegolide neentsimbi zesilivere. Umtshana kaZhao Kuangyin uGao Junbao wemka eBianjing esiya kuhlangula uZhao Kuangyin owayevaleleke eShouzhou. kwaye wanyanzelwa emtshatweni. Esi sibini sikhokele isihlwele ekungqingweni kwaye sahlangula uZhao Kuangyin.
(Umzekeliso weli bali kukuba bobabini abazange baxolelane (baxhatshazwa), kodwa kamva baxolelana.)
聖意: Umzi wasekhaya awuzilungelanga, ulumke ufuna imali, uvimbe ishishini, ulinde umtshato, ulibazise, ​​uLiujia, umhambi wobuxoki, ulala emasimini, iintshulube, kade, umonakalo wemfuyo emithandathu, kunzima ukufumana abantu, amatyala, ilahleko, ukufuduka, ukugcinwa, ukulahleka kwempahla, ukugula okunzulu, ukwandiswa kwentaba, ukuguqulwa kwengcwaba
